summary: created this ENB for the best visuals but keeping performance loss at a minimum, I basically took things for a whole bunch of different ENB\'s and put them all into one, keeping the performance in mind.
descriptionHtml:
This is the first ENB I have ever created, and I am very pleased with it.

This ENB is for the v0.108 version found here: [url=http://www.enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0108.htm]ENBSeries v0.108[/url]

If you like, please endorse!

When I am in-game with this ENB, the performance loss is very minimal, and I am running with over 100 mods installed, on a mid-range PC, if you can\'t tell, I am very pleased with this ENB.

If you want to disable the ENB while in-game; hit shift + F12.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/oyP5vRA.jpg[/img]

Installation:
Put the files into your skyrim directory:
C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\Skyrim

I recommend that you get Dynavison, it works very well with my ENB and makes for great screenshots.

I hope you enjoy, please Endorse and check out my other mods!

My other mods: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/4831711/?tb=mods&pUp=1]My Mods[/url]

Thanks for your time, enjoy!
author: billmineface
